snippet.title: Arma Reforger - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010198

The wait is over! Arma Reforger, the most realistic and immersive military simulator, is OUT NOW on PlayStation 5! 🚨

Transport yourself into Cold War era combat with Arma's open-world, sandbox gameplay. Engage with authentic weaponry, explore detailed environments, and feel every shot with the incredible tactile feedback of the DualSense controller.

Arma Reforger provides endless possibilities and military simulator gameplay completely unparalleled on console, introducing a completely new genre to the platform.

Join the fight for Everon and Arland on PlayStation 5 today!

#ps5 #ps5games 

Rated Mature
